item.title: Complete God of War Sons of Sparta Trophy List—How To Get All Achievements & Trophies
item.content:encoded:
Calling all PlayStation Spartans in training, there’s a hydra-sized God of War Sons of Sparta Trophy List for you to climb, making the arduous trek to Olympus seem like child’s play.

A Metroidvania God of War title was a constant discussion in the rumor pipeline for a long time. The speculation suggested a rumoured God of War Metroidvania game would feature Kratos’ Brother, and it does.

Now that Sons of Sparta is here, there’s no mystery left, other than its Trophy List. A mystery solved in this guide right now.

All God of War Sons of Sparta Trophies & Achievements

God of War Sons of Sparta technically has two Trophy Lists: A listed one and a secret list of hidden trophies—obscured to prevent spoilers. In the main list, you need to find most (if not all) collectibles and upgrades, find lore, and battle strong enemies who would rather see Kratos and Deimos be unalived.

  • More Insider Gaming: Does God of War Sons of Sparta Have A Physical Edition? Price, Explained

A list further down will reveal all the hidden trophies if you wish to view them, but this is a major spoiler warning.

Here’s the complete list of trophies revealed from the start of the game:

  • Duty and Honor: Collect all Trophies
  • The Tourist: Find all Lore
  • The Historian: Collect all Shards
  • The Opportunist: Collect and return all Artifacts
  • Search High and Low: Activate all Globes
  • Self Sufficient: Enhance a Spear or Shield Part
  • Quick Study: Purchase a Skill
  • Panoply Man: Obtain all Spear and Shield Parts
  • Like a Charm: Obtain all Gouri
  • Bust Out: Obtain all Bust Powers
  • Deep Learning: Obtain all Skills
  • All Eyes on Thee: Battle the Escaped

This is your final spoiler warning!

  • The Lionheart: Return the Lion Coat
  • Rightful Owners: Return the Treasure Map
  • Stonewalled: Open the Gorgon Door
  • Cryptic: Open the Mosaic Door
  • Song of the Six: Free the Final Owl
  • Eye for an Eye: Battle the Cyclops
  • Flying Solo: Battle the Bird
  • Bathed in Blood: Battle the Blood
  • Pecking Order: Battle the Twin
  • Evil Within: Battle the Ancient
  • Sea Sickness: Battle the Serpent
  • Wing and a Prayer: Battle the Triplet
  • Heavy Metal: Battle the Bulls
  • Horsing Around: Battle the Tyrant
  • Herding Cats: Fulfill Circe’s Request
  • False Prophet: Stop the Cult Revival
  • With It or On It: Carry the Boy Home
  • Come to a Head: Battle the Dragon Heads
  • No Olive Branch: Complete all Olive Tree Battles
  • Amusing: Complete all Muse Chambers
  • Battle Tested: Complete all Ephor Trials
  • Gift of the Gods: Obtain all Blessings of Olympus
  • Thunderstruck: Battle the Beast
  • The Summit: Battle the Trio

How Many Achievements & Trophies In God of War Sons of Sparta?

There are 36 unique trophies to earn across God of War Sons of Sparta, with the final one being the shiny Platinum Trophy.

  • More Insider Gaming: Is God of War Sons of Sparta on Xbox, PC or Nintendo Switch? All Platforms, Explained

There you have it, you know every trophy in the game, what to do, and how many there are—so what are you waiting for?

Check out the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server, where you can talk about your GOW troubles, adoration, and pet peeves, trying to get the final few trophies!

Make sure you’re completely caught up on the shocking God of War Original Trilogy Remake Announcement.

item.title: Is God of War Sons of Sparta on Xbox, PC or Nintendo Switch? All Sons of Sparta Platforms, Explained
item.content:encoded:
God of War Sons of Sparta takes fans back further than they’ve ever been in the franchise’s long history. A true origin story, Sons of Sparta is a unique adventure, so let’s check if it’s available on platforms not named PS5, such as Xbox, PC, and Nintendo Switch.

The ‘uncs’ of this generation might shudder to hear that God of War is over 20 years old now. There’s a lot of history, which means there’s plenty for the newer generation to revisit—hence the God of War Remake Trilogy being a great learning lesson for many.

However, God of War Sons of Sparta is a new chapter telling the oldest tale.

Can You Play God of War Sons of Sparta on PC?

Despite Sony’s good relationship with PC, God of War Sons of Sparta is not available to buy on any PC storefront.

It seemed unthinkable that God of War could ever be playable anywhere other than on a PlayStation console. This changed when the 2018 reboot received a PC port. This was eventually followed up by Kratos and Atreus’s Ragnarok rumble slamming its way down on PC, too.

But for now, God of War Sons of Sparta remains on PC, with no PC port in sight. As history has taught us, never rule out the possibility of a Spartan journeying across foreign lands.

Can You Play God of War Sons of Sparta on Xbox?

Never has a God of War game been on Xbox, and this doesn’t change with Sons of Sparta.

Xbox has started to dig into its catalog of classics as of late and hand iconic titles over to Sony. As yet, the PlayStation brand hasn’t been quite as generous. Xbox’s GOW (Gears of War) has made its first roadie run to PlayStation, but you’ll have to wait and see if Sony’s GOW will Spartan Change over to Xbox.

Can You Play God of War Sons of Sparta on Nintendo Switch or Switch 2?

You also can’t play God of War Sons of Sparta on Nintendo Switch or the Switch 2.

This was probably the least likely of the three, but it needed clarity. Sorry to disappoint overall. You asked, and IG answered. In this day and age of games going multi-platform and crossing to different sides, though unimaginable, never say never when it comes to God of War Sons of Sparta getting a PC, Xbox, or Switch port.

You’ll hear it here first if they do!

Are you disappointed by the news? Are the Sons of Sparta and Remake Trilogy announcements enough to want to make you finally upgrade to a PS5? Let the team and community know through the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord.

Let’s check out the TV series now, and read about the God of War live-action securing its Atreus actor, and the casting for Thor and Odin.

item.title: PlayStation Plus Game Catalog February 2026 Titles Revealed
item.content:encoded:
Sony has now confirmed that the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog for February 2026 includes Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 with 8 other games.

A report from earlier this week revealed that Insomniac’s hit sequel would headline PS Plus titles in February 2026, along with 2 other games that were accurate as well. Now, the official confirmation has arrived from PlayStation, with games like Monster Hunter Stories 1 and 2 joining the collection as well.

Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, Monster Hunter Stories 1 & 2, and More Confirmed for February 2026 PS Plus Game Catalog

All PlayStation Plus Game Catalog for this month will be available to play on February 17, 2025. There are 9 games available for PlayStation Plus Extra members, and 1 game for PlayStation Premium/Deluxe through the Classics Catalog. The highlights of this month are Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown, Monster Hunter Stories 1 and 2 (right in time to play before MH Stories 3 releases next month), and Rugby 25. Check out the full list of PS Plus Game Catalog games for this month below:

  • Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 | PS5 
  • Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown | PS5 
  • Neva | PS5, PS4
  • Season: A Letter to the Future | PS5, PS4
  • Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin | PS4
  • Monster Hunter Stories | PS4
  • Venba | PS5 
  • Echoes of the End: Enhanced Edition | PS5 
  • Rugby 25 | PS5, PS4 

PlayStation Plus Premium February 2026 Games

  • Disney Pixar Wall-E | PS5, PS4

The list of games for this month was announced through the PlayStation Blog.

In other news, PlayStation came with a bunch of surprises at the State of Play event today, including announcing the God of War Trilogy Remake, shadow dropping Sons of Sparta, and much more. What are your thoughts on the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog games for February 2026? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about the Marvel Tokon Fighting Souls release date and gameplay details being revealed. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Does God of War Sons of Sparta Have A Physical Edition? Sons of Sparta Price, Explained
item.content:encoded:
God of War Sons of Sparta is one of 2026’s biggest and best shocks without question. A new GOW game is a shock, but if you want to know how much it is first, or if it’s on disc, this guide has all the answers.

The February 2026 Sony State of Play had no right to drop bombshell after bombshell. If you thought the news that a God of War Remake Trilogy is coming was big, a shadow-dropped God of War Sons of Sparta was a Cronos-sized surprise

Can You Buy God of War Sons of Sparta On Disc? Physical Edition, Explained

God of War Sons of Sparta is currently a digital-only game, meaning you can buy it from the PlayStation Store on PS5 and nowhere else.

This is likely a case of shocking everyone with an impromptu shadow drop first, accumulating millions in sales and copies sold, then giving the game a second lease of life later down the line with a physical copy.

  • More Insider Gaming: Saros Stars Again During February 2026 Sony State of Play

It’s hard to shadow drop a game on disc, making digital the only logical and viable solution. You can buy either God of War Sons of Sparta Standard Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition to complement your virtual game collection.

The latter comes with several benefits, including in-game items, a digital artbook, soundtrack, and PlayStation Avatar: A fine gift from the Gods of Olympus.

How Much is God of War Sons of Sparta?

God of War Sons of Sparta is $29.99 through the US PlayStation Store or £24.99 in the UK.

For a brand-new God of War game with premium polish, this is a pretty decent price tag. Attaching the God of War brand to anything in 2026 could warrant a hefty price tag, but Santa Monica and Sony have been quite generous here.

  • More Insider Gaming: New Marathon Gameplay Debuts At Sony State of Play

Furthermore, if you want to stump up a bit more Gold, the Digital Deluxe Edition is $39.99 USD or £32.99.

How shocked were you by the God of War Sons of Sparta announcement? Did you have it downloading the second the reveal left Terrence C. Carson’s lips? Share your thoughts about the game and the Trilogy Remake through the Insider Gaming Discord Server. If you don’t, you may displease the Gods!

Also, check out Saber Revealing Keanu Reeves is John Wick in… John Wick.
